name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 3 (DEMO)
description:
Solve puzzles and avoid dangers as you work your way through a twisted version of Blacklands Manor. The story continues on from Mr. Hopp's Playhouse 1 and 2.

A retro 3D horror game.

This demo's playtime is about 15 minutes and is still a work-in-progress. Currently only available in English.

Happy Halloween 2022!
